title: Tallest Plastic Straw Tower | World Record | Aniruddha Chopadekar
body: Aniruddha C. constructed a plastic straw tower 21 feet in height. - may use transparent binding tape - width of tower at base must be no more than nine inches - must follow form of current world record holder - must provide video evidence. Share on Facebook. Share on Twitter. Share link.

Nashik, Maharashtra , India / April 22, 2015

Aniruddha C. constructed a plastic straw tower 21 feet in height.
